description:
In the dark ages of system administration Perl was adopted for many things. Some applications are still in production, MSA is online - they are being called legacy these days. However, they add value to business and are being used...

This lightning talk is about myself being a mentor for OOP, modern deployment environments and being a witness of "I should have used objects..."
title: LPW2014 Lightning Talk   Ulrich Habel ‎rhaen‎   Shhhh, we are busy ‎  mp4 ff
